scenario_1.persona_desc: A person who values happiness and well-being in their daily lives, and is interested in studying the factors that contribute to happiness and well-being in different regions and contexts. They may be curious about the relationship between happiness and life satisfaction, income, and housing costs. They may also be interested in the impact of politics and social issues on the happiness of individuals and communities. They may be concerned with the issue of migration and the way people choose to live and work, and may be interested in the ways in which people make decisions based on happiness, even if it is not their primary goal.

responses.thought: I value fairness and equal distribution. Although option Right gives person A more money, it does not benefit me any more than option Left, while also creating a disparity in our allocations. Therefore, I will choose option Left, which results in a more equitable outcome.
